item.title: Certs
item.description: Red Hat Red Hat Certified Engineer (RHCE) Red Hat Certified System Administrator (RHCSA) Red Hat Certified OpenShift Application Developer Google (GCP) Professional Cloud DevOps Engineer Certification Associate Cloud Engineer Certification Linux Professional Institute (LPI) LPIC-1

item.title: About
item.description: Who am I? Name: Rosen Papazov Nationality: Bulgaria Born: 1991 What do I work? Position: Application administrator Department: Production and development environments Company: Information Services JSC Responsabilities: Make sure everything works and figure out how new things should work. Tech-stack: Linux, Ubuntu & RHEL, k8s, OpenShift, Tekton, F5 Big-IP, Nginx, Tomcat, HAproxy, Ansible, Terraform, GCP, VMware, Proxmox, Zabbix, TCP/IP and everything in-between What do I do when not working? Interests: Series, Films, Music, Technology
